lead_paragraph: Owners of the British Grand Prix track said it had granted exclusivity to an overseas investor on future investment in the Silverstone Circuit, after talks with carmaker Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) were terminated.

headline.print_headline: BRDC in Talks With Investor for Silverstone Circuit After JLR Pulls Out
headline.main: BRDC in Talks With Investor for Silverstone Circuit After JLR Pulls Out

snippet: Owners of the British Grand Prix track said it had granted exclusivity to an overseas investor on future investment in the Silverstone Circuit, after talks with carmaker Jaguar Land Rover (JLR) were terminated....
